p: Among all crop losses caused by abiotic and biotic environmental factors, weeds are inflicting the most damage (34% on average), actually the same amount as pests and pathogens combined [ 286]. The world economic losses due to weeds are estimated to be more than US $ 100 billion dollars [ 287]. Until about the middle of the 20th century, physical (mechanical or hand weeding) action was the main method of fighting weeds, but then it was changed to chemical action, which significantly reduced labor.
